## Softwares and repositories 

- [MATCH](http://match.ctglab.nl/#/home)
- [GWAS Catalog](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/gwas/)
- [GTEX Catalog](https://www.gtexportal.org/home/)
- [PRSice](https://choishingwan.github.io/PRSice/)
- PLINK [v1.9](https://www.cog-genomics.org/plink/1.9/) and [2.0](https://www.cog-genomics.org/plink/2.0/)
- [HAIL](https://hail.is/)
- [SamTools](http://www.htslib.org/)
- [SnpSift](http://snpeff.sourceforge.net/SnpSift.html#annotate)
- [Post imputation checking](https://www.well.ox.ac.uk/~wrayner/tools/Post-Imputation.html)
- [PennCNV](http://penncnv.openbioinformatics.org/en/latest/)

## Consortia 

- [International Inflammatory Bowel Disease Genetics Consortium (IIBDGC)](https://www.ibdgenetics.org/)
- [GIANT](http://portals.broadinstitute.org/collaboration/giant/index.php/Main_Page)
- [CARDIoGRAMplusC4D](http://www.cardiogramplusc4d.org/)
- [DIAGRAM](http://diagram-consortium.org/pub.html)
- [MAGIC (the Meta-Analyses of Glucose and Insulin-related traits Consortium)](https://www.magicinvestigators.org/)
- [Global Lipids Genetics Consortium](http://csg.sph.umich.edu/willer/public/lipids2013/)
- [The GEnetic Factors for OSteoporosis (GEFOS)](http://www.gefos.org/)
- [Psychiatric Genomics Consortium (PGC)](https://www.med.unc.edu/pgc/)
- [The National Institute on Aging Genetics of Alzheimer's Disease](https://www.niagads.org/) (requires access request)
- [CKDGen](https://ckdgen.imbi.uni-freiburg.de/)
